body:
It looks like bootstrap.js is now packaged twice. We try to stop people from packaging the same file contents twice because, uh, well, it's wasteful. :-)

It should be possible to import the bootstrap file from a file protocol, I guess, instead of resource:///, but I haven't tested that.
